info.title: Nuestro Barrio API
info.description: This is the API for the project "Nuestro Barrio" Campaign Management, Recommender and Email Preference Management.

tags.name: segment
tags.description: Segments of audience on the system

tags.name: template
tags.description: Templates of email on the system

get.description: This resource represents the recommendations of events made for the user  calling the API.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The numbers of items to return

options.description: Enable CORS by returning correct headers

get.summary: Get recommended similar events for event
get.description: This resource represents the recommendations of similar events based on the user calling the API and the event specified in the ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Event id to recommend similar events

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The numbers of items to return

options.description: Enable CORS by returning correct headers

get.summary: Get endpoints associated with calling user
get.description: This resource represents the endpoints associated with the user calling the API.

options.description: Enable CORS by returning correct headers

put.summary: Create/Update user endpoint with email preferences
put.description: This resource represents the endpoint associated with the user calling the API.

delete.description: This resource represents the endpoint associated with the user calling the API.

options.description: Enable CORS by returning correct headers

get.summary: Get email endpoint preferences associated with calling user
get.description: This resource represents the email preferences associated with the user calling the API.

options.description: Enable CORS by returning correct headers

get.summary: Get platform account campaign by id

Newsletter Template

Also, company contact information.

Notify to who this email was directed to.

And, explain why user received this email.

options.description: Enable CORS by returning correct headers

Address.description:
Address to send messages to the user. Depends on type, for example, if type is EMAIL then a 
valid email address should be provided.

Type.description: Channel type of the endpoint. Possible values are EMAIL.

CreatedOn.description: When was the endpoint associated with user.

UpdatedOn.description: When was last changed. If no value is sent, date from backend is used.

OptOutAll.description: Set to true to indicate that user doesn't want to receive any kind of messages on the endpoint.

MonthlyNlOptStatus.description: Indicates whether user wants to (OptIn) or not to (OptOut) receive monthly newsletter emails.

OptStatusLastChanged.description: Indicates the last date when changes where made to the endpoint attributes.

OptSource.description:
Indicates the source of the changes. For example, it can be web app to indicate that changes where
made from web app or email when its from link on email to unsubscribe.

Address.description:
Address to send messages to the user. Depends on type, for example, if type is EMAIL then a 
valid email address should be provided.

Type.description: Channel type of the endpoint. Possible values are EMAIL.

CreatedOn.description: When was the endpoint associated with user.

UpdatedOn.description: When was last changed. If no value is sent, date from backend is used.

OptOutAll.description: Set to true to indicate that user doesn't want to receive any kind of messages on the endpoint.

sigv4.description: Works with Cognito Identity Pool (aka. Federated Identity) using AWS IAM roles and policies to grant access to users. Can be changed to work with Cognito Users Pool using JWT Bearer Token claims to grant access to users.
sigv4.name: Authorization
